name: Max
bio: Max is a friendly and energetic golden retriever who loves playing fetch and going on long walks. He was adopted from a local shelter when he was just a puppy.

name: Luna
bio: Luna is a majestic Maine Coon with a gentle personality. She enjoys lounging in her favorite spot by the window and watching birds. Luna was surrendered by her previous owner who could no longer care for her.

name: Buddy
bio: Buddy is a lovable Labrador Retriever with a heart of gold. He is great with children and enjoys swimming and playing with his favorite toys. Buddy was found as a stray and brought to the shelter.

name: Whiskers
bio: Whiskers is a calm and affectionate cat who loves to cuddle. He has a beautiful black and white coat and bright green eyes. Whiskers was brought to the shelter when his elderly owner passed away.

name: Daisy
bio: Daisy is an adorable Mini Lop rabbit with soft, fluffy fur. She loves munching on fresh vegetables and exploring her surroundings.

name: Rocky
bio: Rocky is a gentle and loyal Boxer who loves to play and cuddle with his humans. Despite his age, he still has plenty of energy and enjoys short walks. Rocky was brought to the shelter when his owner moved to a place that didn't allow pets.

name: Skittles
bio: Skittles is a lively and colorful Budgerigar who loves to chirp and play with his toys. He is very social and enjoys interacting with his human companions. Skittles was found as a stray and brought to the shelter.

name: Gizmo
bio: Gizmo is a curious and friendly Abyssinian guinea pig with a unique, fluffy coat. He loves to explore his cage and munch on hay and fresh veggies. Gizmo was surrendered by his previous owner who could no longer care for him.

name: Shelly
bio: Shelly is a wise and gentle Russian Tortoise who enjoys basking under her heat lamp and munching on leafy greens. She has a beautiful, patterned shell and loves to explore her enclosure. Shelly was brought to the shelter when her owner moved to a different country.
